website_summaries.verdict: The perfect multi-functional air sofa that pulls double duty as a love sofa and futon bed without extra accessories.
pros: Designed as a two-piece couch that inflates separately for extra puncture protection
The sofa back is easy to position from upright all the way to laid back
Provides plenty of room for comfortable sleeping
cons: Inflation takes longer due to the two individual sections of the sofa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tent space saver
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for a 6 person tent. It is perfect when you need more room in the tent for changing. I always had a hard time since the regular air mattresses don't leave much room around it. The cup holders are great to hold your phone at night too. Our friends were very impressed with it Too.!! It did deflate a bit but as instructed, you want to leave it inflated a couple of days so it can adjust. Overall, we loved it and definitely recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: LuNa

customer_reviews.title: Good design, yet quality failures!
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable.... yet after a few months of non-abusive every other weekend use, it failed for the first time which was easily repairable only a poorly welded seam. Yet the second time was one internal baffles leaving the seat cushion taunt yet evenly over-inflated and entirely not usable.
customer_reviews.author: Jerod G Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Buyers beware. Intex does not back this product at all even for manufacturing defects.
customer_reviews.text: Buyers beware. Intex does not back this product at all even for manufacturing defects. Asked for a supervisor to contact me to straighten out this matter to no avail no contact was made. My advice to stay away from all intex products. A company who doesn't stand behind their product for sure won't stand with their customers.
customer_reviews.author: Diesel

customer_reviews.title: ... both have deflated on the middle section due to bad stitching. I figured the first one was a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I purchase and both have deflated on the middle section due to bad stitching. I figured the first one was a bad egg but NO, the second one deflated as well. I hope I can reach customer service. I now have both in my closet. they are not even 3 months old.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Hella good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best purchase i have ever made. It sits under my bed in my dorm. When people hangout in my room they just chill on the sofa. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable - never stayed inflated
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure if we received a defective item or it couldn't take the weight of 2 preteens, but this item never stayed inflated from the start. The size was very spacious. It could've slept 2 adults comfortably and I'd say three adults could've sit snuggly. Unfortunately it isn't durable. Especially for a $50+ price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Like it, but not love it
customer_reviews.text: Maybe I need to pump it before each time I need to use it. However, I like it. Quite fit my simple and crude single apartment :)
customer_reviews.author: C.Nekoda

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE. THEY DON'T HOLD AIR AND THEY ARE HORRIBLY UNCOMFORTABLE
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A HORRIBLE PRODUCT. DON'T BUY IT. I BOUGHT 2 OF THEM AND THEY BOTH ARE HORRIBLE AND DON'T HOLD AIR, YOU FILL THEM UP AND 20 MINUTES LATER YOU HAVE TO ADD AIR. ONE OF THEM DIDN'T EVEN LAST 10 MINUTES BEFORE IT COMPLETELY DEFLATED. THE DESIGN IS HORRIBLE EVEN IF THEY DID HOLD AIR! THEY ARE SO TERRIBLE TO EVEN ATTEMPT TO SIT ON, IF YOU SIT ON IT, YOU FALL TO THE SIDE AND THE OTHER END FLIPS UP IN THE AIR, AND IF 2 PEOPLE TRY TO SIT ON IT, THEY FALL OVER AND FLIP OFF. DON'T BUY IT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS IT BOYS!!!
customer_reviews.text: There is not much to say about this but Wow! This air mattress has been so useful and I have taken it to friends houses. I have set it up at my house when we have extra guests. This mattress is inexpensive and can fit 3 people on it with no issues. Whenever people see it, they fall in love with it. Super easy to inflate. It is pretty bulky when you deflate and fold, however, who cares? I have this christmas bag I bought from Amazon and I use it to carry the mattress around as well as the portable air pump. This is one of my favorite purchases. Additionally, this folds out into a queen size air mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Molina

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this useless fancy balloon
customer_reviews.text: I have this for more than a week, I bought this for the spare/guest room. There are 3 sections in the Sofa, the air leaks slowly in the back/hand rest section. Lower 2 flat sections maintain the firmness. First three days the air leaked almost 50%, I thought the valves are loose, so pumped the air and left it for another 2 days, and in the morning almost 1/3 of the air is gone. The maximum usage so far is 4-5 hrs I sat and watched TV on the first day....that is it. A total waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This Couch
customer_reviews.text: We bought this couch because it seemed perfect for a dorm room. We were told that we were supposed to keep on inflating the couch during the first couple of days because the material stretches, and so we did. However, weeks passed and the couch still wouldn't stay inflated. It deflates just a few minutes after its been inflated and is basically useless because no one can sit on it. It just clutters up our room. Our friends purchased this product too and are facing the same problem. We are very disappointed by this product and would not recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Isha Chawla

customer_reviews.title: At first it was letting air out pretty fast. But about a week or two later ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for indoor use for my mini home theater. At first it was letting air out pretty fast. But about a week or two later things settled and it is doing much better. For whatever reason when i sit down it feels as if cushion is tiled forward, gives a feeling of it wanting to push me forward and off the seat. Occasionally top cushion moves forward and hangs off the front, which makes forward tilt worse, has to be constantly adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas

customer_reviews.title: This would be much better if the manufacturer did not put the sections on ...
customer_reviews.text: The arms are not the same as pictured. The one I received had higher sides with cup holders. This would be much better if the manufacturer did not put the sections on the seat. After just a little use, I heard a popping sound. The first section popped up and now is higher than the rest of the seat. I would not purchase this again. It was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: beingrace

customer_reviews.title: Works okay, but needs another foot of heighth.
customer_reviews.text: With an air pump, it was easy to set up. I would not buy this without an ar pump. The hole is about an inch or so wide. After it is pumped up, it is very low to the ground. I am guessing 16" off the ground.. it also leans forward. I put a 2 x8 in the front to lift it up. It is probably best as a slerping bed, or it would be for kids to sit on. If I fold it on top of itself so there is no back, then I can sit on it. I think it needs another foot of height to ve a better sofa. For the price, it works okay.
customer_reviews.author: Buzz006

customer_reviews.title: Deflates
customer_reviews.text: The instructions stated that the sofa would expand causing it to appear to deflate. Well, it's been used 3 times already and it still deflates too much by the morning. I got this to have guests over but they rather sleep on the carpet than on this. Sucks. I should've listened to the comments.
customer_reviews.author: Peachy Mermaid

customer_reviews.title: I only gave this two stars because it was great at first
customer_reviews.text: I only gave this two stars because it was great at first. However, I had the sofa a little over a month and a half and it no longer holds air. I have a small electric pump made specifically for items like this that I used to blow it up and followed the directions perfectly for the care of the sofa. There has never been any rough play on it, only one person has ever sat on it, never been moved around in a room, and sits on a smooth waxed flooring. Therefore, there is absolutely no reason that this should be popped or leaking at all. Highly disappointed and can no longer return it.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Was the best inflatable couch and bed for the first two weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 11 year old son and I, 300 lbs between both of us. Was the best inflatable couch and bed for the first two weeks and it slowly began to leak air through the valves. Received May 18-19th and by June 6th the valves couldn't hold air in. Couple of days later the seem in the interior side handle portion of the couch opened causing it to deflate even faster. P.S. it is the most horribly uncomfortable thing to find yourself sleeping on with it deflates completely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Solution to a Temporary Problem
customer_reviews.text: We had just moved and ordered a custom sofa that was going to take 2+ months to arrive. With nothing to sit on but our nicer side chairs, we looked for a temporary solution and found this. In 2 months, I refilled the air twice...and it wasn't much! Me, my kids, and our dogs all fit on this sofa and it has never given way. The key is to not fill it completely (which the instructions say to do). I highly recommend this product for anyone in the same situation.
customer_reviews.author: They_Call_Me_Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, and a good price
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, and a good price. My fiance loves relaxing on this as he hates our current sofa. It also pulls out into a bed, so we can lay down and watch movies in the living room comfortably. We have two cats with claws and they have left it alone. It doesn't hold the air perfectly like some other mattresses I've used. We're refilling it every few days, but no apparent leaks.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: This really does get holes in it ! But you can find them with a wet face just go close to it and stay to the seams.
customer_reviews.text: I used this Four times and it has a hole in it. The sofa part is completely flat in just a short time while the other two sections stay inflated. And it is just impossible to find the leak. Very disappointed. And it's not easy to sleep on half a bed. I have only used this on a very clean soft carpet. Well after almost a year and fixing the leak I am now going to buy it again. I would definitely recommend this product after I fixed the leak it worked out great for using it as a bed every night for almost a year. For 2 adults.😉 not bad. Thanks I just bought my second one.
customer_reviews.author: Long time Happy Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it arrived quickly and was an amazing asset. i definitely wish our crew invested in ...
customer_reviews.text: this as an impulse buy only a few days before leaving for a festival. it arrived quickly and was an amazing asset. i definitely wish our crew invested in this along time ago. the only tricky part is that there is a picture of a hand pump on the box that tricked my brain into thinking that it was included. however, i have to admit that i clearly did not read the information on the amazon page, as it is made very clear that this product does NOT come with a pump. silly me. the idea of couch lounging at a festival got me so excited that it inhibited my natural impulse to over research.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan L. Resetar

customer_reviews.title: Great for short term use
customer_reviews.text: Product works like it should. However it is very prone to losing air from the fill up valve on my sofa. Other than that it's a great working product. Pro- Affordable , makes a great addition to a camping setup, compact Con- Has trouble keeping in air for more than 24 hours And this is post material stretching. As it recommended from the manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sofa setup is neat
customer_reviews.text: There are three inflation ports, which is due to the shape and the way it folds to be a sofa or bed. It takes a bit to get it set up, but is really comfortable and neat when it is in the sofa setting. The bed setting is fine, it's thin, but pretty much that is necessary for the cross function, again. It doesn't hold air for more than a night, so I am re-inflating every night when in use. It is a bit cumbersome to refold when deflated and ready to store and it did not come with a storage bag. Altogether, I am satisfied with the purchase and have gotten use out of it while camping and moving
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: NOPE!!  DON'T BOTHER, PIECE OF CRAP, WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: PIECE OF CRAP, DON'T BOTHER WASTING YOUR MONEY!!! It says that there will be some air loss for the first few days as it adjust to being inflated, but the thing lost air everyday, followed the instructions to the letter, used it for about 2 months in a spare room as a couch/guest bed and it was uncomfortable to sit on as well as sleep. It lost major air from morning to evening but you could never find a leak... total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: AndreaCMT

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for the grandkids to use on the basement to sleep on and play video games. Easy to vacuum off crumbs after they’ve eaten. Update: Two of the 3 sections lost lots of air. I wasn’t concerned since inflatables need refreshed from time to time. In the process of adding air, my son and I noticed, and could hear, obvious leaks at the seams. We got a repair kit, but that did not solve the problem. We also tried gorilla tape, but that also did not work. Therefore, I have no choice but to retire it and buy bean bag chairs for the grandkids. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Kar-Bear

customer_reviews.title: Great solution for basement!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one at a store, one online. Arrived very quickly. Using them for my kids sleepover. Easy to inflate, have to use a pump of course. But so far so good. Like that you can use it several ways and like the material that covers it. Cup holders are a neat benefit but have not used them yet. I think we will get a lot of use out of them. We have them in our basement since we use this space for different things, we did not want perm. furniture down there. This was a great solution.
customer_reviews.author: L.A.Thurman

customer_reviews.title: Great extra couch
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic buy, and my second one. The first one did get a hole in it somewhere and I couldnt find it. I have a home childcare and in the winter I need more than matts for naps. This folds out for 5 toddler to lay on. They love it and it keeps all kiddos warm and comfy! I throw a blanket over it to protect it , but over all I didnt mind buying another. Its so worth the price. Im sure in a non daycare home it would last a very long time. Very very satisified!
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Very temporary
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased two of these in the last 5 months. The first lasted 3 months before one of the internal dividers broke and it got a hole in the seam. The repair lasted about a week with the patch. We purchased another one and in less than a month it has a leak in about the same spot! I actually think 3 months was a good run for a couch we sat on almost every day, but, not one month! We used a wool army blanket over it to protect it and provide some warmth. No pets.
customer_reviews.author: Emily G

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy Intex Inflatables, they are all defective
customer_reviews.text: This was the second replacement I got and after two weeks it no longer held its shape when inflated making it impossible to sit on. Which I had saved the box so I could return it and get a full refund. Both other items from INtex from Amazon also and both also failed in 2 weeks, same problem, no box so cannot get a refund. Do not buy intex products they are defective.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Koniar

customer_reviews.title: Good for short term
customer_reviews.text: The price is great. It's easy to set up and change configuration when desired. It's also pretty comfortable as a couch or a bed. The reason I gave only 3 stars is because I've been using it for about 3 months and 2 of the internal seams came apart. It still holds air. It's NOT leaking. However, due to the seams not holding, there is a very large bulge where I sit. It goes all the way across. It doesn't make it unbearable, but it's not as good as it was before. Consider weight. I weigh 155 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful and NO warranty when Amazon said there was
customer_reviews.text: I got this product twice because I really wanted this for my children. The same back section keeps deflating. I missed out on the 30 days to return this bc I had surgery but Amazon assured me there should be a warranty and usually this would get resolved by calling the company. I called and she said they (Amazon) was misinformed and there was no warranty. I missed out by 2 wks of the 30 days of having this product. No one actually sat on it because it would be fully deflated by 6 hours. Just don’t buy it and waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Felecia Figurski

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Every time I take this out, I get another hole in it. Now the latest one I can't find. I recommend an intense round of vacuuming and maybe even laying a heavy tarp down first. I'll probably throw it away. NOT comfortable at all, awkward in fact. Very difficult to get into and out of without pulling a muscle or something. The cup holders are a JOKE! How do you expect a liquid to stay in a cup shoved into a balloon? Any kind of movement will cause a wave effect that Empties all drinks. Great idea, poor production.
customer_reviews.author: Jon G.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if my copy was a dud but needed to inflate it everyday as it sat in my living room at an angle like frozen butter that's been sliced at a crooked cut
customer_reviews.text: Was the same equivalency as trying to sit on a medium sized beach ball in the swimming pool...Not sure if my copy was a dud but needed to inflate it everyday as it sat in my living room at an angle like frozen butter that's been sliced at a crooked cut....This inflatable heap of felted plastic had me take a knife to it until it was one big tarp that covered my PAC Man arcade machine on the back patio. Next time I'll just buy some floaties and save 75% of the money and look less stupid amongst friends and neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Goombah

customer_reviews.title: Great for short term use but terrible investments.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as an occasional seating option, never used as a bed. They're very comfortable but my first one began leaking in only 3 weeks from a seam. I managed to patch it but more leaks occurred to the point where patching was not feasible. I pulled out my second one and sure enough, it eventually leaked from a seam as well. All the seams seem to be susceptible to this problem! I averaged about a month and a half of use for each one before I tossed them. They're great when they work but do not expect them to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Just look it speaks practical and smart designed.
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks. Very comfortable. I believe it has a slow leak. That is why I gave it a 4. I use the product to stage REIT zip brought 2 one studio in NC and other for MD . Futhermore give me time to design at faction of the cost. Therefore,so I can buy permanent furniture that similar later. Moreover, If my suspicion is correct about the slow leak I will be returning this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT HOLD AIR!
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold air. It warns you that it will sag at first because the material is stretching. So I allowed for that and gave it a few weeks to stretch. I finally got sick of it and went to return it, but missed Amazon's return window by 2 days. I'll give it two stars because it holds air long enough to make it useful for occasions. BE MINDFUL OF THE RETURN WINDOW. If yours is deflating after two weeks, return it while you still can.
customer_reviews.author: Krist

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: I used this couch for a month between when I sold my old couch and moved into a new apartment. It worked well for what I needed. It needed blown up every week after 2 people had been on it all week. I ended up having to throw it away because it got a hole in one of the cracks on the back and after I patched that, two more holes appeared. I'm not sure if it's from the constant use for a month straight or what but it did it's job and I'd but it again if I needed it.
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Better off on the floor
customer_reviews.text: I had family coming into town and ordered this. lasted 2 days before it literally opened at the seams. while fully inflated it never really made it to "sofa mode". It was like a picture that just seems askew no matter how you hang it. I was informed that night 1 they had to reinflate in the middle of the night (possibly due to a slow leak or the weak seams). Just pay the extra for something of a higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mr HH (Helpful and Honest)

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay inflated straight out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: I must have gotten a dud...the main part of the couch won't stay inflated. This is my first time trying it out I've allowed it to sit and stretch and slowly added more air as needed as per the instructions but the main seat just won't hold its air. I can't seem to find a leak (which it shouldn't have straight out of the box!) but it deflates significantly after just a few minutes and without any use. Of course I ordered this earlier than I needed it so now that I'm finally ready to use it the return window is closed. I am VERY disappointed with this product.
customer_reviews.author: fi fi

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I expected this product to be okay, ya know, functional but not a big deal. I also expected it to be kinda small. Both those assumptions were pleasantly wrong! This this is large enough to seat 3 adults, it’s so nice, and so comfy. We are using it as temporary furniture in our living room and it’s excellent. Very sturdy. I am not a small woman and my husband is not a small man and it holds us just fine. Has cup holders and is soft and comfortable. I am completely blown away by it.
customer_reviews.author: RoxyHufflepuff

customer_reviews.title: Several uses for the money!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this a year ago. It survived 4 kids under 7 and a dog playing and sleeping on it for a week while being moved by adults several times from room to room. Then it survived 2 teens for a few days. Then those same 2 teens plus 2 under 7 and a dog for another week. After all of that use the only damage is a tear in the plastic of one fold (the un-inflated part that folds up to make the couch). We hope to squeeze one more week w/the teens out of it but we definitely got our $45 worth out of this convertible bed/couch!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia A

customer_reviews.title: Best bad decision for under 45$
customer_reviews.text: This may be one of the best bad decisions you can make for under 45 dollars. So to be honest I bought this couch with every intention of breaking it. I bought it solely for the purpose to take white water rafting for a day. This thing took a beating and was able to survive class II Whitewater at a low level suffering many scraps and and 4 punctures still leaving enough air to make it home. All in all it's a great time, just know it might be a one-and-done type deal. And by the way INTEX if you ever want some cool pictures off what your products can withstand send me some freebies.
customer_reviews.author: grammy

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as it looks
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used the sofa as both a bed and a couch. The bed is comfortable to sleep on. When it is in the sofa mode, the backrest is too far back to be comfortable (unless you have really long legs). There is also a slight angle to the couch that makes it feel as though you’re going to slide forward. I like to lay across a couch and put my head on the armrest or place a pillow against the armrest. Unfortunately the design of the sofa makes this impossible due to the slanting armrests. Your head just tilts to the side and is uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: we are currently PCSing, so we thought we’d buy this for the mean time, just to have somewhere to seat on and hang out. At first it was great, it is pretty comfortable and easy to inflate, but after LESS than a month, it seems to have a leak that we cannot find, so its useless, we can’t seat on it anymore because the bottom part goes flat in 2 min. I would not recommend it, unless you want it just for a day or two. We have also tried to contact the company with no luck, so... here we are, in an empty house, with nowhere to seat, just waiting for our furniture to arrive.
customer_reviews.author: Paula G.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last one use
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed in this. We've used it a couple of times, but on the very first time we ever tried it, it started losing air immediately. We compensated by refilling, telling ourselves that new mattresses sometimes lose air. That was NOT the case. After using again, we realized it was not because it's new; there is a leak somewhere, but the entire contraption is so large and cumbersome, we couldn't find the leak. BIG WASTE.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: READ BEFORE YOU BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Well I have bought Intex products before,but I have to say I’m very disappointed in this product. I have already requested a refund. First if all it leaked air the first night. Using as a sofa it’s shown as being 25” high, well it’s actually about 15” high so it’s very hard to get up while sitting on it. Then using as a bed the horizontal folds make it uncomfortable. And it doesn’t offer much support.
customer_reviews.author: amazoncrazy

customer_reviews.title: Great couch.  don't put too much weight or let kids play with it
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost a month since inflated, Great product for the need I had. I use it mainly just for the sofa. It's comfortable, sometimes when I want to lay I just switch and unfold. Between my girlfriend and I (roughly about 300+lbs), not sure how it would hold up with any more weight. Very happy with purchase. I have family coming in for the holidays and I will be sleeping on it so i will come back with updates...
customer_reviews.author: E.Q.

customer_reviews.title: It's a comfy sofa, but it doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: + Comfortably seats three once properly filled. + Portable, lightweight, and reasonably priced. + Sleeps one person comfortably, but only in sofa mode. - It takes a long time to inflate with an electric pump (not included). - Not a good inflatable mattress in fold-out mode, the joints between the cushions are too big. - Only lasted a month with occasional use by one person before the cushions popped and could no longer be inflated.
customer_reviews.author: SteamLizard

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this sofa in October. I must have used for sitting not more than 5 times. The bottom part had completely deflated now with no air staying in it. It has just been sitting at one place and one day I noticed it has leaked out completely. Refilling air doesn't help as it leaks out again in a few hours. I have no pets or kids at home who would have scratched it. Please do not buy this. It's not durable at all. I bought it in about 50$ I see that have slashed the prices too.
customer_reviews.author: Aditi Singh

customer_reviews.title: The reality is far from the promise
customer_reviews.text: I truly applaud the concept and the creativity of its designers but the execution is such a let down. After getting this thing inflated it lasted almost a full six weeks before the first slow leak appeared. From there it was a steady spiral to uselessness. If you only need something to sit on for a few weeks then go for it, if not you’d best save your money and move along.
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and helpful
customer_reviews.text: Helps a lot if you just wanna live in an apartment for a couple of months but have no furnitures at all. You gotta need to purchase a Electric Quick-Fill Air Pump as well. One of the cons is the smell, really annoy if you are sensitive with this problem. My solution is to cover the Inflatable Bed with a bedcover. Another cons is that you'll feel a little bit cold and uncomfortable if you directly sleep on the bed. So remember to put a mat or pad on the bed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Could be better inflatable sofa
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work. I purchased this as a way to relax and to sit on something other than a foldable chair. I want to like it, but the air doesn't hold up. I feel some air escaping on the side, and it's no wonder I have to add air each day. I have yet to find the tiny holes that the air is escaping out of. It's a nice idea, but it's not made well. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: ND

customer_reviews.title: and been more than happy. I inadvertently purchased this model and am incredibly ...
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several Intex inflatable sofa/beds. They last about a year of regular use before they wear out. I've been using the model with higher armests, link below, and been more than happy. I inadvertently purchased this model and am incredibly disappointed. The construction is subpar, it isn't possible, as others have said, to sit upright without sliding forward and deforming the couch, and now within weeks of purchase and moderate use (no kids, no pets, no sliding the thing around, no sudden weight change), the seams of two sections have failed. Of course there is no warranty for this and no way of returning it, though obviously defective. Avoid this product and pay more for higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Gonzo

customer_reviews.title: Losing air
customer_reviews.text: I brought this item about a almost two months ago and i am already losing air out of one area of the inflatable couch. I am using it in the living room for temporarily use until i get my new living room set. i have to inflate it a least once a day, because the air does not hold. I am not happy at all about doing that.
customer_reviews.author: Bernard

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable in any position
customer_reviews.text: As expected it is not comfortable neither in sofa mode nor bed mode. Sofa mode it shapes so you feel like you'll fall from it. Bed mode due to strips between the actual mattresses feels like you fall in between, but I suppose it depends on one's height. Overall after 2 weeks of usage it started to show deformation here and there, we were using as a love sit and the middle of it already has a bump. I do not expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Dorea

customer_reviews.title: Blew up after 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because I only needed a temporary couch to last me through 6 months. Don’t want to deal with moving a real one. It’s comfortable enough, not a lot of support near the front so you have to sit far back, Airs up quick, but refilled 3 times and it was still losing air. Worked fine tho, just alittle soft. Sit on it today and it blew up. 12” hole where the seam comes together. Only 3 weeks old. Smh

customer_reviews.title: Good couch, not great mattress.
customer_reviews.text: This is big and comfortable. I left it inflated for 1 week+ without needing to add air. I did need to eventually add air as it started to sag a bit. Seems pretty durable kids and pets have not popped it after a full week of heavy use, and some deflation, packup, and reinflations. It is not the most comfortable air mattress for sleeping because it is designed to fold.
customer_reviews.author: nj

customer_reviews.title: My tent became the party tent and all my family was happy with this couch/bed
customer_reviews.text: Dopest Inflatable Couch EVER!!! It came on time and measurements were true to description. I took this on my camping trip and placed it inside my 9 person tent, and it instantly was a hit. My tent became the party tent and all my family was happy with this couch/bed. I think the capacity was 400lbs on this baby, but let me tell you, this couch is worth it. For like $40 it was a steal. I use it sometimes for my brother in-law to sleep on when he visits us from the Navy base. Definitely worth it! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because we just moved and didn't have a couch. Super comfortable when it is layed out in what we call "movie mode" but not the best folded up in "couch mode" Our dog popped one section which we were able to patch and use again. He popped another section eventually too but when you have it laying open on the floor, and a dog runs on it, that will happen. It has lasted with a lot of use for months.
customer_reviews.author: Martine

customer_reviews.title: Such a fun and awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: This was amazing for our camping trip. It's very long if you're tall and very comfortable too. It folds up to a sofa so quick and easy in one swift motion. It's saved so much room in our tent and looked really cool as a sofa. Our friends all want one now. It also has cup holders in each armrest. We used it to camp for 5 days and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Parker

customer_reviews.title: In for the long haul, Very happy a few weeks in
customer_reviews.text: My girl friend and I are in MD for 4 months because of work and didn't want to shell out a lot of money for furniture that we would have to haul off when we leave. Enter this wonderful couch. We have be using it full time for a few weeks and its been great. You will need to top it off once or twice while the latex stretches out but overall its super comfortable and we love it. Keep in mind its a bit low so if you have trouble getting up from low seats you might want to look else where.
customer_reviews.author: A. Roush

customer_reviews.title: Jury still out.
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 air Chambers, back, seat, and foot. The Back and seat Chambers hold air on a scale of 1-10 a 6. The foot chamber (which actually is the back rest) a big fat ZERO! Held air (once inflated) for about 15 mins. I am sending this one back and requesting a new one. I'll submit another review once I receive the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Cold War Veteran MP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I've purchased in different sizes. The 1st one I purchased elsewhere and it didn't stay inflated AT ALL and I returned it. This one I kept because it was past the return time. But, it doesn't stay inflated and if when you roll it up to a sofa, if it isn't just right, it's not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Measure twice, order once.
customer_reviews.text: We sleep on a California King so my wife thinks queen size is small, it's not. Inflated, this thing is huge. Way bigger than expected, but thats not a bad thing, just make sure you measure where your putting this thing...twice.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly LeFevre

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Looks good. Cheap. LOOKS comfortable. Portable and easy to use. Reasonably well made. Good dimensions and height from ground. Cons: Uncomfortable as hell to sit or sleep on. The natural of the material means it's all but useless as it stretches and slowly deflates the first few days. I'd like to actually sit down, not spend 15m every 4hr partially re-inflating this thing. There's no structural integrity whatsoever. It's like laying on an oddly shaped beach ball, it wobbles, it tilts, it rolls and shimmies beneath you constantly if you move at all. Given how nice the Intex mattresses are I thought this would be similar, but it's not. It's not worth buying or even trying to use. Honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Pirate_Joke

customer_reviews.title: Damaged fresh out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Buy with caution. As I was blowing mine up for the first time fresh out of the box it had a slice in it and air was pouring out. Luckily amazon support is great and allowed a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Roxy

customer_reviews.title: Works but.....
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been used for a total of two weeks since purchase. We have had to patch 4 holes, the part connecting the folding pieces has ripped almost entirely along the edging. We moved along this time, so maybe some destruction can be placed there.... But, if there's nothing touching it, it isn't on a surface that would cause issues, and it is used properly, why are there so many holes along the stitching? We certainly aren't trying to waste money by letting it get nicked by anything on us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my game room
customer_reviews.text: I love this couch! It’s a little big in my game room but it’s perfect, like any blow up Air mattress it is hard to fold and deflate. Took me about 20 mins to complete hand pump it full, and it does a pretty good job about keeping the air in! I do have to pump more air into it every other day but for the most part it’s been a perfect addition to my little Paradise!
customer_reviews.author: Erika Schulze

customer_reviews.title: Nice for movies in the park
customer_reviews.text: I've taken this with me for the summer movies in the park. It's nice and comfy and opens up to a queen size bed. It's really comfy and blocks the wind. I blow it up at the car and use a wagon to pull it to the grass. The kids really enjoy it and makes for a comfy experience.
customer_reviews.author: K. Blake

customer_reviews.title: Product defective
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd blowup couch - the first one was great and last several years. Bought a new oe a few weeks ago and it didn't hold air anywhere. Called Amazon they told me to throw it out and they would send a replacement which they did. The replacement came and I thought it was good but the frame didn't hold air. So I didn't even bother calling Amazon this time - don't want a replacement - threw out the bloody couch. I am so done with the blowup couch.
customer_reviews.author: Iggyslave

customer_reviews.title: most practical inflatable  bed
customer_reviews.text: Bought two as camping beds and were so great yo have and use. During the day a place to sit and at night a bed to sleep on. Easy to inflate would recommend an battery pump to do in the tent. Did need to inflate daily to keep hard... and best cor lighter people. sime reviews mention small hooes but my came just dine.
customer_reviews.author: Bctrue

customer_reviews.title: Make your camp buddies jealous
customer_reviews.text: We have bought 3 of these over the years. Or friends get mighty jealous when we are camping. We've used it as a floaty when going down the river - also works great! Plus there's cup holders! If any section does deflate the bed is still mostly useable because of the 3 compartments. I've recommended this product to many of my friends and family - they love this too. Takes "glamping" to a new level!
customer_reviews.author: PaintedLaS

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and perfect for sitting
customer_reviews.text: I have used the sofa for 6 days. I am in temporary housing and it is perfect for the occasion. When I first inflated it, the sofa kept losing air. This puzzled me until I noticed that there are adjustment valves on two of the intake valves. Once I tightened those, the sofa was good. I followed the instructions and inflated the sofa for the first few days. It works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Fryson

customer_reviews.title: Good for a temporary piece of furniture when camping or ...
customer_reviews.text: Good for a temporary piece of furniture when camping or when you have guests, which is what air mattresses are for. I noticed most of the negative reviews are from people who bought this thinking it would become some sort of permanent furniture fixture. Air mattresses aren't designed to be used every night for 2 months people. Get real.
customer_reviews.author: dsub

customer_reviews.title: Great couch but doesn't fit sheets
customer_reviews.text: Fun blow up couch/food out bed. There's three areas to blow up. It folds up easily and is pretty comfortable. The only issue is how it's made you can't put a fitted sheet on it and there's non fuzzy vinyl between the cushions. Overall it's nice and comfy and has held up on night with two energetic kids hopping on it.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Seems are week and rip very easily
customer_reviews.text: This would be great except the seams where this folds are very thin. We just finally got it out to use, and the seam ripped the first night. Unfortunately, we bought it months ago, so I’m pretty sure there’s no way to exchange it. We’re all really bummed, because otherwise it would have been great. We put it in the living room for the sleepover, then fold it to a couch the next day so there’s enough places for their friends to sit.
customer_reviews.author: Megan N Kittle

customer_reviews.title: Fold up position leans forward a little too much.
customer_reviews.text: If you've had Intex products before you'll know what to expect. It folds out to a nice sized floor level bed but when it's in the couch position it leans forward in a slightly irritating way. Still functions as well as expected. Just wish they could get the fold position a little more comfortable. Putting that small inconvenience aside I would still buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DMT Productions

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Had to fill and let sit. Then filled again. After each night had to repump every night but it stayed firm throughout the night. Each night I had to pump up to firm up. But it’s huge so there is a lot of stretch, I used a 12volt pump at first. Then figured out a hand pump would get it to the proper fill so I recommend use the power pump to fill then a hand pump to get it completely full
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne J.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE* 11/24/18 One week and already deflating 🤦🏻‍♀️ Didn’t last long. Maybe there’s something else better out there that will last. It was not “LEAKING “ There were two little holes you can clearly hear the air coming out!
customer_reviews.author: Jazzie-M

customer_reviews.title: Great idea but cheap construction
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea for people in apartments or light use but definitely bring a backup if you're going to use this for camping. On its first maiden voyage on a 3 day camping trip the seam connecting the inflatable cushion to the couch itself split, the cushions itself began to lose air pressure very rapidly and essentially became unusable. Leaving us without a cushion to sleep on. It's definitely neat just don't expect much out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This couch has amazing comfort. Your back leans into the couch and allows you to rest. The back of the couch does not force you to sit forward. Two persons can sit in this couch comfortably. It is durable and strong. You have to inflate the sections of the sofa to keep it firm. It looks good, feels good and I recommend this couch to customers.
customer_reviews.author: Xexus

customer_reviews.title: Mine was defective with a slow leak night one. Returning.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to use this as a temporary bed for a cross country move. First night I used it i woke up in the middle of the night on a wood floor. Filled with air again at 2am and made certain valves were closed tight. Woke up in the morning again on a wood floor. Worst night sleep ever after a 3 day 1,500 mile move. Bought a king size mattress:frame proper first thing. Tonight I sleep well, tomorrow this defective air bed gets returned to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: CharlieJack

customer_reviews.title: Defected Air mattress
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this air mattress for a camping trip we took last week. It leaked both nights. I doubled checked it the first night to make sure the parts were all tight and after blowing it back up it was flat again by morning. Now I am on the last day to return and unable to do so. I would not order from this manufacturing again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Blair

customer_reviews.title: INFLATABLE GARBAGE COUCH FOR REAL
customer_reviews.text: I would give it less than one star but I can't this thing is cheap soon as I aired it up within 3 days of it .It got a mysterious hole in the front and the middle would (very cheap stitching )not air again are up again thing as sheep they do not backup warranty on it it's basically a scam do not buy $80 for a cheap latex deflated couch and outfits in my closet garbage strike Intex shame on you
customer_reviews.author: David A Addison

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well, I was hoping to get one that didn't leak, unfortunately I have to add air every 3 days. I am disappointed that in this day and age that non-leaking air furniture is not the norm. Update so a inner seam on the couch seat came unattached, so there is a big bulge now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Good in a pinch
customer_reviews.text: Great for a quick easy place for people to sit thats about it I only bought again because I need something and have very little space. 1st 2 of them I bough had internal air tube failures after about 3 months each time with minimal use making it impossible to use further.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Giannola

customer_reviews.title: Quick fix - still working months later
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these as a quick fix for the kids to play and watch TV in the basement till we actually get to remodeling the basement. Anyway, they have been up for 3 months and are still up. Had to refill one side once but that is to be expected. Holding up to kids playing, making forts, walking all over and even us adults hanging out on them. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mommy

customer_reviews.title: No need to "sit" on this. (That pun was awful...)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this when I was doing traveling medical work. I needed something compact but comfortable. I was honestly concerned after reading reviews because I didn't want it to bow out. I used it for three months and I never had any issues with any malfunctions. You'll have to put air into maybe once a week if you use it actively. It DOES NOT come with an air pump. Fortunately, I had one already since we were sleeping on an air mattress. As an added perk it has cup holders!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Welborn

customer_reviews.title: Buy them AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: So when I first looked at it I wanted it Bc I habe a large tent and it would Be perfect to have it folded up during the day! So I said eff it got 2 one for adults one for kids, got them and cheesh it was heavy box lolol so... got it out started pumping it up and whoa was it bigger then I assumed and the material was amazing thick and durable !! These are perfect for anything !! I’ll rebuy these again I’d the day comes; out blanket on it. It’s kids and 100#golden fit husband fit I fit lol
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Great design, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Fun! We camped out with it, and three of us shared it comfortably (one adult, one teen and one pre-teen). It inflated easily with the Intex hand pump I bought (awesome pump!) and held air like a champ, even in a tent for three weeks. It is also reasonably comfy as a couch, and sure to become sleepover staple.
customer_reviews.author: L. E. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Very low to ground did not stay as firm as I hoped . Better for bed than couch. But good to have on hand . Needed a couch in a quick pinch and this did the trick while we waited did the new couch to be delivered. Really wish I can get it back in the box !!! Doe !!
customer_reviews.author: Steve S

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I looked at a lot of reviews on this and was a little skeptical. It performed exactly as I wished. Camped for a week on one occasion and 5 days on another. Didn't have to refill with air at any point. Mines did come with cup holders as a few people mentioned theirs did not. On the 5 day trip I did add another queen on top just because I wanted to be a little higher off the ground. It still worked out ok.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Leaked on third time sitting. Cannot be repaired. Waste of money. don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product at first but after a few times light use, this mattress deflated and no amount of pumping air into it could fix it. I tried to find the leak to repair but it's fairly large and could not find. It was useless. Very disappointed but giving 2 stars instead of 1 because it was a nice product for about 3 times of sitting on it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet J. Choi

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks in, no complaints.
customer_reviews.text: The first few days I had to inflate it every couple of hours. Now I have to put some more air in about every day which is reasonable with me.(Sleeping on it two nights in a row without inflating was fine) It is more comfortable than we anticipated, both as a couch and as a bed. As a couch, it sits three people no problem. cup holders are small but will hold a regular sized drink or cup. As a bed two adults can sleep on and have plenty of room. The backing for the couch also acts as a nice and soft headboard.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Li

customer_reviews.title: Awful
customer_reviews.text: Should have paid attention to the reviews, as i usually do with most products i order from amazon. This thing is horrible. You pretty much have to roll yourself off of it to get up. And im an active, healthy, person. It lasted for about 3 weeks, then kept deflating, yet I tried everything to find the leak. Ended up being two different places on the seams. Dont waste your money. Horrible.
customer_reviews.author: HM

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay inflated
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Thanksgiving guests have used now five times in my apartment and the section that is the base of couch and first bed piece will not hold air. Every 4 hours it deflates by 50%. I have ensured that the valve is screwed on tightly as well as checked for leaks. Now I'm past my return date and am stuck with a faulty air mattress. I'm giving two stars due to the fact that for those first couple hours it is inflated it's very comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Just set this up. it is comfy and it isn't lopsided if you sit on one end. It is a little lower to the ground than anticipated, but otherwise it fits well in our recreational room for our teens to use.
customer_reviews.author: V. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Arrived leaking and useless
customer_reviews.text: I bough 4x of these inflatable sofa beds. The first 2 were inflated and the middle section had a leak, rendering it useless as a bed or a sofa. The third might have been fine but by then the batteries on the pump were dead. I tried to return the unopened 4th, but the return period had lapsed. Super disappointed. Will not buy again and I am very annoyed with the vendor.
customer_reviews.author: JimBaum

customer_reviews.title: Seam Broke
customer_reviews.text: After a few days the seam split on the sitting part and could no longer sit on. Up until that point it was great. I have sent 3 e mails to company support and each time they ask for more information that I already have sent. Come on Intex stand by your product! I don't want my money back just a sofa that is not defective.
customer_reviews.author: Heathersthings

customer_reviews.title: While we were waiting for our new furniture, we ...
customer_reviews.text: While we were waiting for our new furniture, we purchased this to sit on. It worked for what we needed it for, however, when sitting on it, you lean forward too much. But it served its purpose and it held air. The two weeks it was being used, I never had to add more air after the initial airing and stretching. Folding it back up was more frustrating than anything else!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Intex Pull-out Sofa Inflatable Bed, 76" X 87" X 26", Queen
product_meta.description: Built for versatility, the Intex Pull-Out Sofa is designed for relaxing just about anywhere, whether you are camping or at home. Watch TV, read a book, or just relax with a friend and then pull out the cushion into a queen size air mattress when you are ready to go to sleep. Inflates and is ready to go in minutes! The Pull-Out sofa is constructed with high quality vinyl and engineered to seat or sleep two people. It also features two quick inflation and deflation valves for maximum convenience. Does not include a pump.
feature_bullets: Location, temperature, and humidity will affect the firmness of the airbed. Airbeds will need to be occasionally re-inflated (topped off) to maintain desired firmness when used for more than a few days as vinyl tends to relax over time

Measurements will vary based on the way in which the customer inflates the airbed. Airbeds are measured from the widest point including the beams (bulges) on the side and off the tallest point from the floor including built-in pillows if applicable
2 quick inflation and deflation valves.comfortable backrest and armrest
Will seat and sleep two people folds compactly for storage
Upon deflating, pull out sofa folds compactly for storage or travel
Note : Item will "Stretch" and will settle after 2 to 3 night of use. To keep adding air until it holds its shape. Pump Not Included

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
